member.name: M:seizure_filter.MainForm.#ctor
member.summary:
INPUT taken from Prompt and/or an existing configuration file
OUTPUT include real time plotting of:
Occipital EEG data (see and )
Their difference (see and )
(3) Root mean square (RMS) (see and ) (4) Short-time Fourier transform (STFT) (see and ), (5) Limited band power (LBP) (see and ), (6) Alarm rates for 3 alarm levels of RMS (see and ),
